com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.lang

Class UsingRuleBuilder<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.lang.UsingRuleBuilder<T,U>

  • public class UsingRuleBuilder<T,U>
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds the portion of a Rule that is available in the languate on 'using'.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
